about.title: Hi there! I'm Caio, a software engineer and ML researcher based in Brazil.
about.description:
As a versatilist software engineer, I'm constantly exploring new technologies and architecting systems to meet evolving demands, always fostering performance and interoperability between components.

Additionally, I'm deeply involved in accessibility research within machine learning, specially in the development of models that can help visually impaired people.

cookies.title: We use cookies
cookies.description: We use cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website. For more information on how we use cookies, please see our cookie policy.
cookies.agreed: " you agree to our use of cookies.
